projects.name: Aladino Lamp
projects.description:
AladinoLamp is a smart lamp with a temperature sensor and can be controlled by a smartphone or desktop through wifi.



(Academic Project)



**Technologies**



C/C++, Java, Arduino, Android and IOs

projects.name: 24LC256-Arduino-Library
projects.description:
Arduino Library for Microchip 24LC256 256Kbit I2C CMOS Serial EEPROM.



**Technologies**



C/C++ and Arduino

projects.name: Restructuring of CLIMA-Madeira Observatory Platform
projects.description:
Academic Project in the scope of the license degree final project.



It consisted in the development of a platform, migrating the content and its structure from the old platform, and in the development of a mapping component.







###### Technologies



WordPress, PHP, jQuery and Leaflet.
